abstract: In the latest crackdown on illicit pillow talk, the Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday accused a former Oracle vice president of improperly profiting from his wife’s knowledge about two deals engineered by her boss, Oracle’s chief executive, Lawrence J. Ellison.
lead_paragraph: In the latest crackdown on illicit pillow talk, the Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday accused a former Oracle vice president of improperly profiting from his wife’s knowledge about two deals engineered by her boss, Oracle’s chief executive, Lawrence J. Ellison.

headline.main: Another Couple’s Sweet Nothings Lead to Insider Trading Charges
